page.title: 07Market Gardening.
page.content: At Copse Cottage Farm they own 150 acres and at Dounhurst Farm they own 396 acres. Dounhurst Farm is quite old,but Copse Cottage was only built a few years ago.The machinery they use at Copse Cottage is tractors, balers, harvesters, mowers, bedders, baler elevators, and horse boxes, and at Dounhurst Farm they have tractors to make burrows to plant new trees, and sprayers to spray the fruit. At Dounhurst Farm they have apples, pears, plums, raspberries, blackcurrants, and loganberries. At Copse Cottage they have lettuces, eggs and cream, and they have a farmshop. They have a farmshop at Dounhurst too. At Copse Cottage they have cows and calves.The cows are Freisian milkers and the calves are beef calves.
